name: Espresso Granite
keywords: dessert, espresso, heavy cream, gluten-free, nut-free, vegetarian

recipeInstructions.text: Combine the espresso, sugar and Sambuca. Refrigerate until chilled. Pour the espresso mixture into a large shallow pan and place in the freezer. Stir every 20 minutes until there is no liquid in bottom of the pan, about 1 hour. Spoon the granite into four chilled dessert glasses. Top with a dollop of whipped cream and serve.
